verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came to me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1980>Go<s%> and <S%H7121>cry<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; I <S%H2142>remember<s%> thee, the <S%H2617>kindness<s%> of thy <S%H5271>youth<s%>, the <S%H160>love<s%> of thine <S%H3623>espousals<s%>, when thou <S%H3212>wentest<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> me in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, in a <S%H776>land<s%> that was not <S%H2232>sown<s%>. thee: or, for thy sake

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> was <S%H6944>holiness<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and the <S%H7225>firstfruits<s%> of his <S%H8393>increase<s%>: all that <S%H398>devour<s%> him shall <S%H816>offend<s%>; <S%H7451>evil<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> upon them, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> ye the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and all the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, What <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> have your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in me, that they are gone <S%H7368>far<s%> from me, and have <S%H3212>walked<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1892>vanity<s%>, and are become <S%H1891>vain<s%>?

Neither <S%H559>said<s%> they, Where is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that brought us <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, that <S%H3212>led<s%> us through the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, through a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H6160>deserts<s%> and of <S%H7745>pits<s%>, through a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H6723>drought<s%>, and of the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>, through a <S%H776>land<s%> that no <S%H376>man<s%> passed <S%H5674>through<s%>, and where no <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%>?

And I <S%H935>brought<s%> you into a <S%H3759>plentiful<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>, to <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> thereof and the <S%H2898>goodness<s%> thereof; but when ye <S%H935>entered<s%>, ye <S%H2930>defiled<s%> my <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H7760>made<s%> mine <S%H5159>heritage<s%> an <S%H8441>abomination<s%>. a plentiful: or, the land of Carmel

The <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> not, Where is the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>? and they that <S%H8610>handle<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> me not: the <S%H7462>pastors<s%> also <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against me, and the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> by <S%H1168>Baal<s%>, and <S%H1980>walked<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> things that do not <S%H3276>profit<s%>.
Wherefore I will yet <S%H7378>plead<s%> with you, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and with your <S%H1121>children's<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> will I <S%H7378>plead<s%>.

For pass <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H339>isles<s%> of <S%H3794>Chittim<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%>; and <S%H7971>send<s%> unto <S%H6938>Kedar<s%>, and <S%H995>consider<s%> <S%H3966>diligently<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> if there be such a thing. over: or, over to

Hath a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H3235>changed<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%>, which are yet no <S%H430>gods<s%>? but my <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H4171>changed<s%> their <S%H3519>glory<s%> for that which doth not <S%H3276>profit<s%>.
Be <S%H8074>astonished<s%>, O ye <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, at this, and be horribly <S%H8175>afraid<s%>, be ye <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2717>desolate<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

For my <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7451>evils<s%>; they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> me the <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>, and hewed them <S%H2672>out<s%> <S%H877>cisterns<s%>, <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H877>cisterns<s%>, that can <S%H3557>hold<s%> no <S%H4325>water<s%>.
Is <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%>? is he a <S%H1004>homeborn<s%> <S%H3211><s%> slave? <S%H4069>why<s%> is he <S%H957>spoiled<s%>? spoiled: Heb. become a spoil?

The young <S%H3715>lions<s%> <S%H7580>roared<s%> upon him, and <S%H5414>yelled<s%> <S%H6963><s%>, and they <S%H7896>made<s%> his <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H8047>waste<s%>: his <S%H5892>cities<s%> are <S%H3341>burned<s%> without <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%>. yelled: Heb. gave out their voice
Also the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5297>Noph<s%> and <S%H8471>Tahapanes<s%> have <S%H7462>broken<s%> the crown of thy <S%H6936>head<s%>. have: or, feed on thy crown

Hast thou not <S%H6213>procured<s%> this unto thyself, in that thou hast <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H6256>when<s%> he <S%H3212>led<s%> thee by the <S%H1870>way<s%>?

And now what hast thou to do in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, to <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H7883>Sihor<s%>? or what hast thou to do in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>, to <S%H8354>drink<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H5104>river<s%>?

Thine own <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> shall <S%H3256>correct<s%> thee, and thy <S%H4878>backslidings<s%> shall <S%H3198>reprove<s%> thee: <S%H3045>know<s%> therefore and <S%H7200>see<s%> that it is an <S%H7451>evil<s%> thing and <S%H4751>bitter<s%>, that thou hast <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%>, and that my <S%H6345>fear<s%> is not in thee, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

For of old <S%H5769>time<s%> I have <S%H7665>broken<s%> thy <S%H5923>yoke<s%>, and <S%H5423>burst<s%> thy <S%H4147>bands<s%>; and thou <S%H559>saidst<s%>, I will not <S%H5674>transgress<s%> <S%H5647><s%>; when upon every <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H1389>hill<s%> and under every <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H6086>tree<s%> thou <S%H6808>wanderest<s%>, playing the <S%H2181>harlot<s%>. transgress: or, serve

Yet I had <S%H5193>planted<s%> thee a noble <S%H8321>vine<s%>, wholly a <S%H571>right<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%>: how then art thou <S%H2015>turned<s%> into the degenerate <S%H5494>plant<s%> of a <S%H5237>strange<s%> <S%H1612>vine<s%> unto me?

For though thou <S%H3526>wash<s%> thee with <S%H5427>nitre<s%>, and take thee <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H1287>soap<s%>, yet thine <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> is <S%H3799>marked<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

How canst thou <S%H559>say<s%>, I am not <S%H2930>polluted<s%>, I have not <S%H1980>gone<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1168>Baalim<s%>? <S%H7200>see<s%> thy <S%H1870>way<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%>, <S%H3045>know<s%> what thou hast <S%H6213>done<s%>: thou art a <S%H7031>swift<s%> <S%H1072>dromedary<s%> <S%H8308>traversing<s%> her <S%H1870>ways<s%>; thou art: or, O swift dromedary

A wild <S%H6501>ass<s%> <S%H3928>used<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, that snuffeth <S%H7602>up<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> at her <S%H185>pleasure<s%> <S%H5315><s%>; in her <S%H8385>occasion<s%> who can turn her <S%H7725>away<s%>? all they that <S%H1245>seek<s%> her will not <S%H3286>weary<s%> themselves; in her <S%H2320>month<s%> they shall <S%H4672>find<s%> her. A wild: or, O wild ass, etc used: Heb. taught her pleasure: Heb. the desire of her heart turn: or, reverse it?

<S%H4513>Withhold<s%> thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> from being <S%H3182>unshod<s%>, and thy <S%H1627>throat<s%> from <S%H6773>thirst<s%>: but thou <S%H559>saidst<s%>, There is no <S%H2976>hope<s%>: no; for I have <S%H157>loved<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%>, and <S%H310>after<s%> them will I <S%H3212>go<s%>. There: or, Is the case desperate?

As the <S%H1590>thief<s%> is <S%H1322>ashamed<s%> when he is <S%H4672>found<s%>, so is the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3001>ashamed<s%>; they, their <S%H4428>kings<s%>, their <S%H8269>princes<s%>, and their <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and their <S%H5030>prophets<s%>,

<S%H559>Saying<s%> to a <S%H6086>stock<s%>, Thou art my <S%H1>father<s%>; and to a <S%H68>stone<s%>, Thou hast brought me <S%H3205>forth<s%>: for they have <S%H6437>turned<s%> their <S%H6203>back<s%> unto me, and not their <S%H6440>face<s%>: but in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H7451>trouble<s%> they will <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, and <S%H3467>save<s%> us. brought: or, begotten me their back: Heb. the hinder part of the neck

But where are thy <S%H430>gods<s%> that thou hast <S%H6213>made<s%> thee? let them <S%H6965>arise<s%>, if they can <S%H3467>save<s%> thee in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of thy <S%H7451>trouble<s%>: for according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of thy <S%H5892>cities<s%> are thy <S%H430>gods<s%>, O <S%H3063>Judah<s%>. trouble: Heb. evil
Wherefore will ye <S%H7378>plead<s%> with me? ye all have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against me, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

In <S%H7723>vain<s%> have I <S%H5221>smitten<s%> your <S%H1121>children<s%>; they <S%H3947>received<s%> no <S%H4148>correction<s%>: your own <S%H2719>sword<s%> hath <S%H398>devoured<s%> your <S%H5030>prophets<s%>, like a <S%H7843>destroying<s%> <S%H738>lion<s%>.

O <S%H1755>generation<s%>, <S%H7200>see<s%> ye the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>. Have I been a <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%>? a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3991>darkness<s%>? wherefore <S%H559>say<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%>, We are <S%H7300>lords<s%>; we will <S%H935>come<s%> no more unto thee? We are: Heb. We have dominion

Can a <S%H1330>maid<s%> <S%H7911>forget<s%> her <S%H5716>ornaments<s%>, or a <S%H3618>bride<s%> her <S%H7196>attire<s%>? yet my <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> me <S%H3117>days<s%> without <S%H4557>number<s%>.
Why <S%H3190>trimmest<s%> thou thy <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H160>love<s%>? therefore hast thou also <S%H3925>taught<s%> the wicked <S%H7451>ones<s%> thy <S%H1870>ways<s%>.

Also in thy <S%H3671>skirts<s%> is <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of the <S%H34>poor<s%> <S%H5355>innocents<s%>: I have not <S%H4672>found<s%> it by secret <S%H4290>search<s%>, but upon all these. secret: Heb. digging

Yet thou <S%H559>sayest<s%>, Because I am <S%H5352>innocent<s%>, surely his <S%H639>anger<s%> shall <S%H7725>turn<s%> from me. Behold, I will <S%H8199>plead<s%> with thee, because thou <S%H559>sayest<s%>, I have not <S%H2398>sinned<s%>.

Why gaddest thou <S%H235>about<s%> so <S%H3966>much<s%> to <S%H8138>change<s%> thy <S%H1870>way<s%>? thou also shalt be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, as thou wast <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%>.

Yea, thou shalt go <S%H3318>forth<s%> from him, and thine <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon thine <S%H7218>head<s%>: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H3988>rejected<s%> thy <S%H4009>confidences<s%>, and thou shalt not <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in them.
